title: My Friend Cannot Join My Club
body:
My friends and I wanted to create a club so that we can all play under the same tag. One of our friends cannot join because it says "(player name) cannot join the club because he hasn't played a game" but when he has played several games. This happens when we invite him to the club. My friend is a level 8 so I'm not sure if that has anything to do with it. All help is appreciated. Thank you very much.

-MySlicLife

replies.body: I'm not sure about this one, unfortunately.  Have your friend hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can investigate this further or pass it on to our clubs team to review.  We'll reply back to him as soon as we can!

The same thing is going on with me. I cannot join a club or create my own club. The club tab does not show up for me on the new client. Looking at some reddit posts, apparently this is happening to a lot of newly created accounts
What should the support ticket be categorized as? A technical issue?
